name: One Teddy Lost (Puddle Jump Studios, Matteo Vera, yarnottc7892)
name_original: One Teddy Lost (Puddle Jump Studios, Matteo Vera, yarnottc7892)
description:
One Teddy Lost is a 3rd person, kid-friendly horror, puzzle game. You play as a child living in the wasteland of nuclear and climate apocalypse.  After ending up in an abandoned factory, that was once operated by the the curious company Just Add Water, your only friend, a Teddy Bear, has gone missing. Navigate through the abandoned factory, solve puzzles, befriend the odd little capsule creatures, but be sure to watch out for the mysterious beast lurking within.

One Teddy Lost was created by a team of 11 students from the Game Design and Development major at the University of Wisconsin-Stout.

Controls:

WASD - To Move 

Mouse - To Move Camera 

E - Interact with objects 

Hold Right Click - Aim 

(While Aiming) Left Click - Throw Pickup Object

Tab (or 1,2,3) - Cycle selected monster

G - To Direct selected monster

F - To Recall/Tell to Stay selected monster

R - Return all monster to you

Left Shift - To activate selected monster's ability
